sentences.en: They were understandably disappointed with the result.
sentences.cn: 他们对结果感到失望是可以理解的。

sentences.en: Officials are understandably nervous about the tense situation in the neighbourhood.
sentences.cn: 官员们对这个地区的紧张局势很感不安，这是可以理解的。

sentences.en: Disagreements on such matters can understandably cause problems.
sentences.cn: 在这些事情上的分歧会导致问题，这是可以理解的。
